# collectionView

**Instance Property**

The collection view object currently using this layout object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var collectionView: UICollectionView? { get }
```

## Discussion

The collection view object sets the value of this property when a new layout object is assigned to it.

## Getting the collection view information

- **collectionViewContentSize**: The width and height of the collection view’s contents.
